entry.title: Ukraine Appeals for More Support From West as Russia Resumes Strikes
entry.content: The barrage of missiles that Moscow unleashed on Ukrainian cities earlier this week has highlighted Kyiv’s limited ability to defend population centers against attack.

entry.title: Deadly Ebola Outbreak Spreads to Uganda's Capital
entry.content: The outbreak is raising fears of a wider spread of the deadly Sudan strain for which there are no proven vaccines or antiviral treatments.

entry.title: How Ukrainian Strategy Is Running Circles Around Russia's Lumbering Military
entry.content: Classic military operations and nimble battlefield decision-making are exploiting the incompetence and top-down command of Russian forces. “Without high mobility, we wouldn’t have been able to outplay Russians.”
